defaultMessage: Because we need you to understand that we cannot...
Access your account or send your funds for you.
Recover or change your private key.
You and only you are responsible for your security.
Be diligent to keep your wallet data file and passphrase safe and don’t share it with anyone you don’t trust!
If you lose your wallet data file, passphrase, and private key no one can recover it for you.
If you enter your passphrase, wallet data file, or private key on a phishing website, you will have all your funds taken from you.
Why Should I Read All This
